item.description:
Due to the sell out of our previous Best Weekend of Your Life we are offering another for those who missed out!

The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge in Bartlett, NH for a great weekend of skiing and riding. This is the First Race Weekend of the EICSL season and it is taking place at Bretton Woods so members of our club and our guests can purchase discount lift tickets for Saturday, January 8th, at Bretton Woods whether racing or not for only $45.

First and second time guests are welcome for only $10 per night guest fees - this is half off regular price!

Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+

This weekend will sell out so be sure to RSVP early to reserve your bunk!
item.name: The Next Best Weekend of Your Life - January 7-9, 2011
